document_data.caption2: Elemental weevils, the greater of two weevils.
document_data.name: Weevil
document_data.mainbody: '''Weevils''' were tiny [[insect]] [[beetle]]s that were known to be pests in food storage areas in [[Skullport]].
document_data.Habitat:
In midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], weevils were a common sight in subterranean [[humanoid]] habitats. They often infested dungeons of Skullport, feeding on poorly kept sacks of [[flour]] and [[grain]]s.

Some species of weevils were native to [[Maztica]].
document_data.Uses: Weevils could be summoned alongside other crawling insects via the Maztican ''[[hishna]]'' spell ''[[pestilence]]''.
document_data.Variants: * [[Elemental weevil]]s, tiny smoldering critters that were found on the slopes of [[Mount Hotenow]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
